overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, engaging a total of 3580 followers. The engagement is driven by posts on academic research, information operations, and computational methods, with LinkedIn showcasing the highest interaction levels.

contentThemes.description: Posts regarding new algorithms and research in identifying coordinated actions on social media.
Announcements for academic positions and research grants in computational social science.
Discussions and announcements related to research on disinformation and information operations.

recommendations: Increase post frequency on LinkedIn to further leverage the high engagement rates observed.
Diversify content themes to include more interactive elements like polls or Q&A sessions to boost engagement across platforms.

platformInsights.mastodon: Moderate engagement with a dedicated follower base; content focused on research updates and discussions.
platformInsights.linkedin: Highest engagement platform; posts about grants and hiring attract significant attention and interactions.
